item.title: Trump says 'HELP IS ON ITS WAY' for Iran as protest death toll tops 2,000
item.description: The death toll over 16 days of mass anti-government protests in Iran reached 2,000 as of Monday, according to data published by the the U.S.-based HRA...

item.title: Inflation held firm in December, testing Fed amid DOJ probe into Powell

item.title: WATCH: Paraglider survives nearly 500-foot fall into ocean
item.description: A paraglider survived a nearly 500-foot fall into the ocean off the coast of Florida, authorities say.

item.title: WATCH: Tiny deer has face off with rhino
item.description: A small muntjac deer scared off a 2 ton Colossal Indian rhinoceros at the Wroclaw Zoo in Poland.
